item.title: Accepting New Clients
item.description: We offer mobile sharpening services, mobile tool sharpening, blade sharpening, and mobile knife sharpening services in the greater Traverse City Area. If you would like to participate in our commercial knife swap program, or inquire about getting your home kitchen knives sharpened, please reach out here.
